ModMetaData.name: 【ZP】Rice cultivating translation
ModMetaData.author: Tosenbo
ModMetaData.description:
Language
Fully supported ・None
Partial not supported ・English ・简体中文(ChineseSimplified) ・繁體中文(ChineseTraditional) ・한국어(Korean)
-------------------
[h1]The original text of this mod is made in Japanese.[/h1] [U]Please be sure to check ”Translated thread”.[/U] [U]There is a description about how to change "English" from "Japanese".[/U]
-Regarding translation- >The translation at the time of vr1.0 can still be used by introducing the translation mod. (Some translations are broken due to system restructuring.) >This is to make the translation update smoother. >The author doesn't make English translation because he wants to create another Mod. >We welcome volunteers who can translate from Japanese into various languages !! >GitHub is available for translation work.
[url=https://github.com/Tosenbo/-ZP-Rice-cultivating-translation]GitHub →【ZP】Rice cultivating translation[/url]
>Give credit to those who participate. >All translations are left to the translator. >If you have any questions about the translation, ask the translator.
-------------------
English is prepared in the translation folder. If you want to use a different language, please create a new language folder yourself.
Steam\steamapps\workshop\content\294100\\Languages\English
Here is the English translation file. Please change the English translation folder name to the language name you are using.
